data.caption: Address Change
data.news_body: Silly Monks Entertainment Limited has informed the Exchange regarding change in Registered Office of the company from Survey No. 91, 3rd Floor, Technical Block, Sundarayya Vignana Kendram (SVK), Gachibowli, Rangareddi, Hyderabad, Telangana, India, 500032 to Survey No.90/1, Plot No.2,  TRENDZ ETERNITY , 2nd Floor, Greenland Colony, Gachibowli Village, Serilingampally Mandal and Muncipality, Ranga Reddy District.

data.caption: Updates
data.news_body: Mark Corporate Advisors Private Ltd  has submitted to  the Exchange a copy of Offer opening public announcement under Regulation 18(7) of SEBI (SAST) Regulations, 2011, as amended and corrigendum to the letter of  offer for the attention of the eligible Equity  shareholders of the company.

data.caption: Updates
data.news_body: Prasada Rao kalluri has submitted to the Exchange a copy of Recommendation of the committed of Independent Directors (IDC) on the open offer to the public shareholders of the company under Regulation 26(7) of  SEBI of india (SAST) Regulations, 2011 and subsequent amendments thereto SEBI (SAST) Regulations, 2011.

data.caption: General Updates
data.news_body: Silly Monks Entertainment Limited has informed the Exchange about Outcome of Nomination and Remuneration Committee meeting for allotment of 7,173 equity shares pursuant to Silly Monks ESOP scheme 2023.

data.caption: Shareholders meeting
data.news_body: Silly Monks Entertainment Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Proceedings of Extraordinary General Meeting held on November 27, 2025. Further, the company has submitted the Exchange a copy of Srutinizers report along with voting results.
